content: I was thinking of having a representative from the food bank present at the event to give a brief speech about the impact of food insecurity in our community and how the funds raised will be used. I'd also like to have a donation station set up where participants can bring non-perishable food items to donate to the food bank. Additionally, I'd like to offer the food bank an opportunity to promote their services and upcoming events to the participants. What do you think?
